name: Abandoned Slime Staff
tooltip: Cast down from the heavens in disgust, this relic sings a song of quiet tragedy...
Consumes all of the remaining minion slots on use
Must be used from the hotbar
Increased power and size based on the number of minion slots used
Holding this weapon grants 10% increased jump speed

buffs.name: Astral Jelly (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The mini astrageldon slime will protect you

name: Ancient Ice Chunk
tooltip: Summons an ice clasper to fight for you

buffs.name: Ice Clasper (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The ice clasper will protect you

name: Ares' Exoskeleton
tooltip: Creates a panel with four slots and four choices above it: Plasma, Tesla, Laser, and Gauss
Clicking one of the choices and then clicking one of the slots allows you to summon a cannon that stays close to you and attacks nearby enemies
Clicking on a slot that's already occupied destroys its associated cannon and clears the slot
Cannons take 3 minion slots each

buffs.tooltip: Pulse cannon not included

name: Atlas Munitions Beacon
tooltip:
Drops down a crate from the sky that opens up to reveal a mounted, stationary cannon
The cannon will fire at any potential enemies within its range, and enter overdrive mode if said enemy is close to the cannon When in overdrive mode the cannon uses three barrels that each collectively fire. The cannon also heats up the more it fires in overdrive mode
Players may right click to pick up the cannon and use it for themselves, if they are selecting an Atlas Munitions Beacon. When players fire the cannon, it automatically enters overdrive mode If the held cannon becomes hot due to overdrive mode, you are forced to drop it. Otherwise, right clicking allows you to drop it manually If the held cannon is dropped back onto the mount, it is attached again   It's surprisingly easy to pick up
Summons an Atlas Soldier to fight for you
Takes up 3 minion slots and only one can exist

name: Belladonna Spirit Staff
tooltip: Summons a cute forest spirit that scatters toxic petals

buffs.name: Belladonna Spirit (buff)
buffs.tooltip: A cute forest spirit is following you

name: Black Hawk Remote
tooltip: Summons a Black Hawk jet to fight for you

buffs.name: Black Hawk (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The fighter jet will protect you

name: Blood Clot Staff
tooltip: Summons a blood clot to fight for you

buffs.name: Blood Clot (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The blood clot will protect you

name: Borealis Bomber
tooltip: Summons aureus bombers to fight for you
Aureus bombers explode on enemy impact
Does not consume minion slots

name: Cadaverous Carrion
tooltip: Summons a gross Old Duke head on the ground

name: Calamari's Lament
tooltip: Summons a squid to fight for you

buffs.name: Calamari (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The squid will protect you

name: Caustic Croaker Staff
tooltip: Summons a toad that explodes if enemies are nearby

name: Caustic Staff
tooltip: Summons a mini dragon to fight for you
The dragon can inflict several debilitating debuffs if you hold a summon weapon or tool

buffs.name: Caustic Dragon (buff)
buffs.tooltip: A mini jungle dragon is following you

name: Christmas Carol
tooltip: Summons a carol bell to support you
Hitting the bell with a whip causes it to unleash a damaging sound pulse

name: Cinder Blossom Staff
tooltip: Summons a really hot flower over your head
There can only be one flower

buffs.name: Cinder Blossom (buff)
buffs.tooltip: A hot, searing flower is floating uncomfortably close to you

name: Cinders of Lament
tooltip: The Witch, a sinner of her own making,
Within her mind her demon lies, ever patient, until the end of time.

name: Cold Divinity
tooltip: Summons the power of the ancient ice castle
For each minion slot used, you will gain an additional orbiting shield spike
These spikes accelerate rapidly towards a nearby enemy to inflict heavy damage
They take some time to regenerate after launching themselves at the target, however
On right click, summons a duplicate ring around the targeted enemy, which slowly converges before exploding

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

buffs.name: Cold Divinity (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The magic of the ancient ice castle will aid you

name: Corroslime Staff
tooltip: Summons a corro slime to fight for you

buffs.name: Corroslime (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The corroslime will protect you

name: Corvid Harbinger Staff
tooltip: Nevermore.
Summons a powerful raven which teleports and dashes

buffs.name: Raven (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The powerful raven will protect you

name: Cosmic Immaterializer
tooltip: Summons a cosmic energy spiral to fight for you
The orb will fire swarms of homing energy bolts when enemies are detected by it
Requires 10 minion slots to use and there can only be one energy spiral
Without a summoner armor set bonus this minion will deal less damage

buffs.name: Cosmic Energy (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The cosmic energy will protect you

name: Cosmic Viper Engine
tooltip: Summons a cosmic gunship to shoot down your foes

debuffs.name: God Slayer Inferno
debuffs.duration: 3 seconds (Concussion Missile)2 seconds (Homing, Splitting Rocket)1 second (Shrapnel)

buffs.name: Cosmic Viper (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The cosmic gunship will protect you

tooltip: Summons a crim slime to fight for you

debuffs.name: Frostburn

tooltip: Summons a Daedalus Golem soldier that fires pellets and electricity
Shining god of greed

buffs.name: Daedalus Golem (buff)
buffs.tooltip: A crystal golem is following you

tooltip: Summons a dank creeper to fight for you

buffs.tooltip: The dank creeper will protect you

buffs.name: Dazzling Stabber (buff)
buffs.tooltip: En garde

name: Deepsea Staff
tooltip: Summons an aquatic star to fight for you

buffs.name: Aquatic Star (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The aquatic star will protect you

name: Devious Aestheticus
tooltip: Shot spread scales with up to 8 empty minion slots
'If you're seeing this, You've been in a coma for 20 years, I don't know where this message will be, but please wake up'

name: Dormant Brimseeker
tooltip: You could’ve sworn that they turned even scarier when you looked at their reflections in a mirror
Summons a brimseeker to keep you company
Firing another brimseeker when all minion slots are filled summons a brimstone aura
The aura empowers your brimseeker summons and produces damaging fireballs
Only one aura can persist at a time

buffs.name: Brimseeker (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Does it want something from you?

name: Dragonblood Disgorger
tooltip: Summons a skeletal dragon and her two children
Requires 6 minion slots to be summoned
There can only be one family

buffs.name: Skeletal Dragons (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Big happy family

name: Dreadmine Staff
tooltip: Summons a dreadmine turret to fight for you

tooltip: Summons an elemental axe to fight for you

buffs.name: Elemental Axe (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The elemental axe will protect you

name: Endo Hydra Staff
tooltip: Summons a frigid entity with a head
If the entity already exists, using this item again will cause it to gain more heads

buffs.name: Endo Hydra (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The endo hydra will protect you… for some reason

name: Endogenesis
tooltip: Ice puns not included

debuffs.name: Glacial State
debuffs.tooltip: Cannot move and defense is shattered

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

buffs.tooltip: The ascened[sic] Cooper will protect you

tooltip: Summons a profaned energy turret to fight for you

buffs.name: Eye of Light (buff)
buffs.tooltip: I watch over you my friend

name: Eye of Night
tooltip: Summons a diseased eyeball that attaches to enemies and inflict cursed flames

debuffs.name: Cursed Inferno
debuffs.tooltip: Losing lifeAll damage taken increased by 20%

buffs.name: Eye of Night (buff)
buffs.tooltip: It eerily watches

name: Flamsteed Ring
tooltip: Now, make them pay.

debuffs.name: Andromeda Cripple
debuffs.duration: 6 seconds (Dismount while a boss is alive)

buffs.name: Andromeda (buff)
buffs.tooltip: You're controlling a piece of history

name: Flesh of Infidelity
tooltip: Summons a tentacled ball of flesh that splashes blood onto enemies

buffs.name: Flesh Ball (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Why is it following you?

name: Flowers of Mortality
tooltip: Summons five rainbow flowers over your head
The combined flowers consume two and a half minion slots

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

buffs.tooltip: Celestial blossoms surround you

tooltip: Summons ancient mineral sharks to take on your foes.

tooltip: Summons a frozen flower over your head

buffs.name: Frost Blossom (buff)

name: Fuel Cell Bundle
tooltip: Releases a small, special variant of the plaguebringers

buffs.name: Mini Plaguebringer (buff)
buffs.tooltip: A small plague bee is following you

name: Gamma Heart
tooltip: Summons radioactive heads that are bound by your body

debuffs.name: Sulphuric Poisoning
debuffs.tooltip: The acidic water burns away your flesh

Aberrations fire vomit at nearby enemies with every third attack firing bubbles

tooltip: Summons astral probes to protect you

buffs.name: Astral Probe (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The astral probe will protect you

name: Guidelight of Oblivion
tooltip: Shadows dream of endless fire, flames devour and embers swoop

tooltip: Summons a stack of haunted dishes to fight for you

buffs.name: Haunted Dishes (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The haunted dishes will protect you

tooltip: Summons a Herring to fight for you

buffs.name: Herring (buff)

tooltip: Summons an astral hive to protect you

name: Igneous Exaltation
tooltip: Summons an orbiting blade

tooltip: Summons a hermit crab to fight for you

buffs.name: Hermit Crab (buff)

name: Metastasis

A gruesome warning for those blinded by the hunger for power.

buffs.name: Sepulcher (buff)
buffs.tooltip: It is not benevolent

name: Midnight Sun Beacon
tooltip: Summons a UFO to vaporize enemies

buffs.name: Midnight Sun UFO (buff)
buffs.tooltip: A strange UFO is observing you, and it's making you very uncomfortable

name: Morpho Doomblade
tooltip: Swings a doomblade that shoots crescent slashes
Using RMB summons an Arbiter of Judgement that does not consume minion slots
Attacks from the blade and arbiter inflict Whispering Death and Valfrey Burn
'Now all will witness its true power!'

debuffs.name: Whispering Death
debuffs.tooltip: Death approaches; defense, movement speed, attack power and life regen reduced

name: Mounted Scanner
tooltip: Laser technology used in this case for both targeting and defense
Summons a powerful weapon above your head that fires lasers at nearby enemies
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

buffs.name: Mounted Scanner (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Powerful machinery surrounds you

name: Orthocera Shell
tooltip: Summons a flying orthocera sentry at the mouse position

name: Perdition
tooltip: Summons a beacon at the position of the mouse
When a target is manually selected via right click it releases torrents of souls from below onto the target
Only one beacon may exist at a time

buffs.name: Perdition (buff)
buffs.tooltip: How unfortunate

name: Plantation Staff
tooltip: Summons a miniature plantera to protect you
Fires seeds, spiky balls, and spore clouds from afar to poison targets
Enrages when you get under 75% health and begins ramming enemies
Occupies 3 minion slots and there can only be one

debuffs.name: Poisoned
debuffs.duration: 5 seconds (Contact)3 seconds (Green seed, Thorn ball, Spore)1 second (Pink seed)

buffs.name: Plantation
buffs.tooltip: The miniature plantera will protect you

name: Pole Warper
tooltip: Magnetic devices which tear at foes by propelling themselves off their opposite counterparts
Incredibly dangerous
Summons a pair of floating magnets that repel each other and relentlessly swarm enemies
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

buffs.name: Pole Warper (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Sentient magnets are attracted to you

name: Polyp Launcher
tooltip: Summons a polyp bunch that launches coral chunks at nearby enemies

name: Pulse Turret Remote
tooltip: A device used to defend against the weaker, less cognizant rogue creations of Draedon
Summons a pulse turret which eradicates nearby foes with focused energy blasts
Only one pulse turret may exist at a time
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

name: Resurrection Butterfly
tooltip: Remembering the melancholy of human existence
Even ghosts stray from the path of righteousness
Summons a pair of butterflies to fight for you

buffs.name: Resurrection Butterfly (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Sleep beneath the Cherry Blossoms, Red-White Butterfly

tooltip: Summons a long-abandoned drone to support you
The drone slowly follows your cursor and inflicts Irradiated to nearby enemies

buffs.name: Rusty Drone (buff)
buffs.tooltip: A pitifully fragile drone is observing you

name: Sand Sharknado Staff
tooltip: Summons a sandnado to fight for you

buffs.name: Sandnado (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The sandnado will protect you

tooltip: Gain absolute control over light itself
Summons a radiant aura
Consumes all of the remaining minion slots on use

Increased power based on the number of minion slots used

buffs.name: Sirius (buff)
buffs.tooltip: A bit too bright, but it helps me

tooltip: Summons a slime ball that follows you
The ball flies toward nearby enemies and explodes into slime on enemy hits
Does not consume minion slots

name: Snake Eyes
tooltip: Surveillance drones equipped with a strong electric field which can be directed at enemies
Summons a mechanical watcher that zaps and flies around enemies

buffs.name: Snake Eyes (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Always watching...

name: Spikecrag Staff
tooltip: Summons a spikecrag to protect you

tooltip: Summons a squirrel squire to fight for you

tooltip: Summons an aerial mechworm to fight for you

buffs.name: Mechworm (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The mechworm will protect you

tooltip: Small novelties created to easily transport and fire plasma, strangely popular with humans
Summons a biomechanical frog that vomits plasma onto enemies
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

buffs.name: Star Swallower (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Mmmm myes

name: Stormjaw Staff
tooltip: Summons a baby stormlion to fight for you

buffs.name: Baby Stormlion (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The baby stormlion will protect you

tooltip: Summons a solar god spirit to protect you

buffs.name: Solar God Spirit (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The solar god spirit will protect you

name: Sun Spirit Staff
tooltip: Summons a solar spirit to protect you
There can only be one spirit

buffs.name: Solar Spirit (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The solar spirit will protect you

name: Tactical Plague Engine
tooltip: Summons a plague jet to pummel your enemies into submission
Jets will fire ammo from your inventory, 66% chance to not consume ammo
Sometimes shoots a missile instead of a bullet

buffs.name: Tactical Plague Engine (buff)
buffs.tooltip: A giant plague jet is following you

name: Temporal Umbrella
tooltip: Surprisingly sturdy, I reckon this could defeat the Mafia in a single blow
Summons a magic hat to hover above your head
The hat will release a variety of objects to assault your foes
Requires 8 minion slots to use and there can only be one hat

buffs.name: Magic Hat (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The hat carries your soul, bound by a contract

name: Terreye Staff
tooltip: Takes up 4 minion slots to summon a trio of floating biomasses to shoot at and ram at enemies
Hold right click on an enemy to channel a sigil on them
Once the sigil reaches full size, the trio rapidly converge on it, dealing massive damage and spawning healing life hearts
Only one set of eyes can exist

buffs.name: Terreyes (buff)
buffs.tooltip: It's not easy being green

name: The Dreaming Ghost
tooltip: Beneath the tree's roots lies the pain of a thousand souls
Summons a pair of crystalline butterflies to fight for you
Each pair takes up 4 minion slots
Each active purple butterfly increases your damage by 10%
Each active pink butterfly increases your life regeneration by 2

buffs.name: Resurrection Butterfly (buff)
buffs.tooltip: Aren't they beautiful?

name: Tundra Flame Blossoms Staff
tooltip: Summons three unusual flowers over your head
Each flower consumes one minion slot

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

buffs.name: Tundra Flame Blossom (buff)
buffs.tooltip: A perfect unison of balance and beauty

name: Universe Splitter
tooltip: Summons an energy field at the mouse cursor
After the field has been deployed, it begins to summon multiple small beams
After several seconds have passed, an enormous laser beam appears at the field's position
This effect has a cooldown
Attempting to use this item during the cooldown will cause it to short circuit and do damage to you.
An ancient artifact from a previous age, it waits for your command...
This is a terrible idea, but it isn't yours anyways... right?

debuffs.name: Universe Splitter Cooldown
debuffs.tooltip: You cannot use the Universe Splitter

name: Vigilance
tooltip: Summons a soul seeker to fight for you

buffs.name: Soul Seeker (buff)
buffs.tooltip: It definitely wants something from you

tooltip: Summons a baby eater of souls to protect you

buffs.name: Vile Feeder (buff)

buffs.name: Sage Spirit (buff)
buffs.tooltip: It's uncomfortably close

name: Virid Vanguard
tooltip: Summons a blade to float behind you
The blades will slash at enemies in front of you, inflicting Poisoned

buffs.name: Virid Vanguard (buff)
buffs.tooltip: A perfect act of unity surrounds you

name: Void Concentration Staff
tooltip: Summons a foreboding aura that attacks by firing void orbs
Minion damage is increased by 5% while the aura is active
Requires three minion slots to use
Only one may exist
Right click to launch a black hole that grows in size

buffs.name: Concentrated Void
buffs.tooltip: The infinite void yearns for more...

name: Wither Blossoms Staff
tooltip: Summons four decaying flowers over your head
The combined flowers consume two minion slots

buffs.name: Wither Blossoms
buffs.tooltip: Pestilence surrounds you

buffs.name: Angry Butterflies
buffs.tooltip: Butterflies can overwhelm enemies in large numbers

buffs.name: Wulfrum Droid (buff)
buffs.tooltip: The wulfrum droid will protect you

name: Wulfrum Fusion Array
